Description: Fragment of rim and wall of North Ionian black-figured pottrrty plate; flat rim with vertical ridge on its inside; outside and top of rim glazed; ridge painted with added red; on outside of floor black-figured palmette and lotus bud frieze in unusual style; added red disc at centre of bud with incised contour; to the inside, part of an exergue line or an accidental stroke of glaze; eexterior: lip glazed, set of four bands on mid-wall, with further glaze at lower break.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1121)
